text: AWS Glue makes it easier to integrate your data
for analytics and machine learning.
But data lakes and other repositories
can turn into data swamps
if quality isn't monitored closely.
And monitoring data quality manually is time consuming,
error-prone, and expensive.
AWS Glue Data Quality helps you deliver high quality data
across your data lakes and pipelines.
AWS Glue Data Quality automatically compute statistics
for your data sets.
Then recommends rules to check for freshness, accuracy,
and integrity.
You can accept or reject the proposed rules
or create new ones based on your needs.
(graphics clunking)
Once implemented, it monitors and measures your data quality
and alerts you if it deteriorates, so you can catch
and correct issues before they impact your business.
Data quality rules can be applied to data
already in your data lakes and data warehouses
and across your data pipelines,
preventing compromised data
from ever landing in your data lakes in the first place.
Using the open source framework, Amazon Deequ,
you can manage your data quality with flexibility
and portability while scaling data to any size
with AWS Glue Serverless Foundation.
Build confidence in your data with AWS Glue Data Quality.
(bright music fades)
